title: The Idea of You Book Club + Emotional Support Group.
itunes:title: The Idea of You Book Club + Emotional Support Group.
description:
It's our June Book Club! Today is Becca's Superbowl... also known as The Idea of You Emotional Support Group. If you’ve been listening for a while you know how OBSESSED we are with this book. Seriously, we’re still trying to figure out how life continues after reading it. We finally get to talk about it today. Becca has begun her healing process through writing her own sequel. In light of this book, Becca and Grace talk about their favorite boy band, leading to a heated debate over whether or not Mark Wahlberg was actually a real member of New Kids on the Block. Finally, we talk about the youngest age we would date and whether that changes if he was famous (hint: it does). 

Also in this episode, Grace had a mini college reunion at the Boston live show and Becca is still distraught over this book, but is recovering with the show Dead to Me.  

PSA: Tomorrow we are releasing a bonus episode with the incredible writer of this book, Robinne Lee, where we practically beg for a sequel. Don’t miss it!

Sponsor:

  • Beauty Pie: To get $50 extra allowance to use on your first month, go to beautypie.com and use code GRACESENTME
  • Hello Fresh: For $80 off your first month of Hello Fresh, go to hellofresh.com/BOP and enter code BOP at checkout

 

Books Mentioned:

The Idea of You

City of Girls

Tell Me Lies

Match Making for Beginners

The Friends We Keep

Mrs. Everything

I Miss You When I Blink

A Nearly Normal Family

The Bookish Life of Nina Hill

 

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
